value.title: The wrong answers to 30 common Power BI interview questions 2022
value.excerpt: There are multiple websites that offer Power BI interview questions and answers and after reviewing them, I have collected 30 common Power BI interview questions that have wrong answers and together we will figure out what the right answer is.  Join me and lets clarify those topics once and for all!
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/sVDd9fLyImM" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Trim column headers with spaces in between words in one step in Power Query
value.excerpt: There is a trim function in Power Query to get rid of spaces at the beginning or end of a phrase, but unlike excel trim, it wont get rid of excess whitespaces between words.  In this video, I will show you how to get rid of all spaces no matter where they are on one step in power query.  Other column

value.title: What is Vertipaq and how does it work? Part 1: Data compression
value.excerpt: What is Vertipaq and how does it work? Part 1: Data compression Vertipaq is the database and engine that runs on top of Power BI and PowerPivot.   When we import data in Power BI, the Vertipaq database will try with a series of algorithms, to compress the data as much as possible and the best way possible
